rule_text: A unit is represented by a plastic figure.   85.1 There are three types of units: ships, ground forces, and structures.   85.2 Each color of plastic comes with the following units:         3 Space Docks       6 PDS units       8 Destroyers       8 Cruisers       2 War Suns       12 Infantry       10 Fighters       4 Carriers       5 Dreadnoughts       1 Flagship     85.3 Units exist either on the game board or in a player's reinforcements.         Ground Forces       Ships       Structures
